entitySemantics.name: Multiple Users or Single Team Ownership
entitySemantics.description: Validates that an entity has either multiple owners or a single team as the owner.

entitySemantics.name: Multiple Domains are not allowed
entitySemantics.description: By default, we only allow entities to be assigned to a single domain, except for Users and Teams.

entitySemantics.name: Multiple Data Products are not allowed
entitySemantics.description: By default, we only allow entities to be assigned to a single Data Product.
